text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 11:55 AM   ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About content and application providerCommunication has become an essential part of every business and a foundation for the organizational and personal development. In the internet era, information is just not limited to PC hardware and peripherals. With the advancements in technology, most organizations prefer to store information at data centers remotely, not locally such as on a PC hard drive or a local server. In today's world of cloud computing, data centers and wide area communications such as hosting of content and application heavily depend on computing operations. Several millions of new users, exponentially increasing number of new devices, gigabytes of consumptions of bandwidth per user per device on daily or weekly basis, and rising fixed and mobile network content consumption are driving the need to invest in hosting services. With the increasing need to fulfill the demand from end-users, content and application providers are investing in cloud data centers across the emerging markets ranging from the Middle East to APAC.Technavio's analysts forecast the global content and application provider market to grow at a CAGR of 4.6% over the period 2014-2019. Covered in this Report This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects of the global content and application provider market for the period 2015-2019. It presents the detailed analysis of the investment done by vendors in the market in the sequential process involved in offering content and application such as hosting, transport, and delivery of content and application. The market is divided into the following segments based on investment in following activities:- Hosting services- Transport - Delivery Technavio's report, Global Content and Application Provider Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the Americas, APAC, and EMEA. It also covers the landscape of the global content and application provider market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the Key Vendors operating in this market.Key regions
